description:
These waterproof running pants keep you warm and dry, even when Mother Nature has other plans. Breathable DriLayer® Seal fabric and ankle zips help prevent overheating.

  • Quick-drying DriLayer® Seal fabric is soft against the skin and wicks moisture to keep you dry and comfortable
  • Ankle zips let you change without taking off your shoes
  • Articulated knees allow for full range of motion
  • Pants pack easily into the internal stash pocket
name: Brooks High Point Waterproof Pant - Women's
